title: 10 Ban system in solo q
body: If the 10 ban system were to be implemented into ranked would it be better for it to be for maybe Platinum + as it may appear very confusing for new players?

replies.body: I don't see why it would be confusing to players below platnium... i mean you pay attention and it asks you to ban a chamion...

This.

It's not much different from the current system, all it requires is that you actually pay attention in champ select, which you should be doing anyway.
But I want to leave getting a drink, going to the loo and having a smoke till after I have found a game so I dont have time to com with team or watch for invades.
Everyone should get a ban each, there is so many league champs these days

Greetings GubGubz Carry,

I think that with the way the ranked system its going to be, its really only going to be confusing for players that are transitioning from the current ban system to the new ban system as its not what the are used to in ranked. 

---

If for example Riot were to split it up in the way that you recommended we would have an issue on our hand of people getting so used to the 6 ban system over so many games climbing up to platinum, and then when they get to platinum everything changing and leading to a lot of confusion.

Doing it in this sense could also lead to players building up small champion pools that they are used to, and then the champions that they are planning banned out once they get to platinum making it so that they suddenly have to learn new champions.

---

With the way Riot is doing it currently people are getting to see how the system works in competitive play and see how pro players are adjusting. This is good because as players in solo queue we can learn from this as to how to adjust how we go about champion select and improve as players going into the new system.

---

Overall though that is just my opinion on how it might end out if Riot were to do it with only in plat+ let me know your thoughts on the points that I have brought up. If there is anything I can clarify on or any other questions I can answer let me know. Good luck in your games.

~Elam
